response:
I can help with your order, but I’ll need your order ID.
Please provide it in your next message, for example: 'My order ID is 1001'.

Hello Jane! Your order #1001 has been shipped and is on its way to you via DHL. You can track its progress anytime using this link: https://tracking.example.com/1001. Your package is expected to be delivered by November 23, 2025. Thank you for your purchase!
I’m here to help with order tracking, returns, refunds, shipping, and payments. If you have any questions about your order or need assistance with those, feel free to ask!
